summary: MATTEI - The Death Of MATTEI, also known as the Matt's Death, refers to the peaceful passing away of the Hoppy known as the meme Pepe, whose real name is Hoppy, on May 24th, 2024. In the wake of her passing, many fans of hers, as well as enthusiasts of matt coins and other zogz-related memes, began to post memorials, fan art, tributes and their favorite memes from zogz collection as their way of paying respects. The dog's death also garnered considerable press and media coverage around the globe.
